times repeat r1 until work measures 10 / 25 5cm r3 p1 k2 p2 k2 k2tog ssk k2 p2 k2 p1 from beginning on last round stop 1 stitch 6 times 96 sts before the eor marker move the eor r4 p1 k2 p2 k6 p2 k2 p1 6 times marker by slipping 1 stitch to the rn r5 p1 k2 p2 k1 k2tog ssk k1 p2 k2 p1 removing the eor marker slipping 1 stitch 6 times 84 sts to the ln and replacing the eor marker on r6 p1 k2 p2 k4 p2 k2 p1 6 times rn r7 p1 k2 p2 k2tog ssk p2 k2 p1 6 proceed to crown shaping times 72 sts r8 p1 k2 p2 k2 twice p1 6 times double-sided cable brim version r9 p1 k2 p1 k2tog ssk p1 k2 p1 6 r1 * k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round times 60 sts r2 repeat r1 r10 p1 k2 k2tog ssk k2 p1 6 times r3 * k2tog but keep sts on ln knit first st 48 sts again slip both original sts off ln r11 p1 k1 k2tog ssk k1 p1 6 times p2tog but keep sts on ln purl first st 36 sts again slip both original sts off ln repeat r12 p1 k2tog ssk p1 6 times 24 sts from * to eor r13 k2tog ssk 6 times 12 sts r4 repeat r1 cut yarn leaving a 6 / 15cm tail using the repeat r1 4 three 3 more times yarn needle thread yarn tail through repeat r1 until work measures 10 / 25 5cm remaining loops and pull tight to close up from beginning on last round stop 1 stitch the stitches move yarn tail to ws before the eor marker move the eor marker by slipping 1 stitch to the rn removing the eor marker slipping 1 stitch finishing to the ln and replacing the eor marker on weave in all ends  rn proceed to crown shaping crown shaping both versions switch to dpn when the stitches will no longer fit around the circular needle
